name: Goblin Ear
description: A pointed ear from a goblin.

name: Wolf Fang
description: A sharp fang from a wild wolf.

name: Slime Gel
description: Gelatinous substance from a slime.

name: Boar Tusk
description: A sturdy tusk from a wild boar.

name: Bone Fragment
description: A piece of bone from a skeleton warrior.

name: Spider Silk
description: Strong silk thread from a giant spider.

name: Orc Hide
description: Tough hide from an orc grunt.

name: Bat Wing
description: A leathery wing from a cave bat.

name: Lizard Scale
description: A shimmering scale from a lizardman.

name: Harpy Feather
description: A beautiful feather from a harpy.

name: Golem Core
description: The magical core of a stone golem.

name: Bandit Mask
description: A mask worn by bandits.

name: Ancient Bark
description: Bark from an ancient treant.

name: Ectoplasm
description: Ethereal substance from a ghost.

name: Ogre Club
description: A massive club wielded by an ogre.

name: Wyvern Scale
description: A tough scale from a wyvern.

name: Troll Blood
description: Blood with regenerative properties from a troll.

name: Fire Essence
description: Pure elemental fire essence.

name: Stone Heart
description: The petrified heart of a gargoyle.

name: Demon Horn
description: A cursed horn from a demon.

name: Wing Membrane
description: A thin membrane from a Wing creature.

name: Flem Core
description: The core essence of a Flem creature.

name: Stinkbug Shell
description: Hard chitinous shell from a Stinkbug.

name: Flem Guard Badge
description: A badge worn by Flem Guards.

name: Demolis Fragment
description: A crystalline fragment from a Demolis.

name: Heavy Wing Feather
description: A sturdy feather from a Heavy Wing.

name: Splinter Shard
description: A sharp shard from a Splinter Brat.

name: Lunker Tooth
description: A sharp tooth from a Lunker.

name: Warbeast Claw
description: A massive claw from a Warbeast.
